banner.redesign: Read about the launch of the InReach App redesign on our blog. <Link>Learn more.</Link>

call-out.who-we-are:
<Title1>Who we are</Title1>
<Text>We are a trans-led tech nonprofit increasing resource access for the diverse LGBTQ+ community.</Text>
<Link>Learn more about us.</Link>

<Text>Our tech platform is 100% free for everyone to ensure safe help is always InReach.</Text>

values.safety-first:
<Title2>Safety-first ğŸ”’</Title2>
<Text>We know online anonymity can be a life-or-death issue for LGBTQ+ people. That's why our App is designed to protect users' confidentiality and safety online.</Text>
<LinkSafety>Learn more about our privacy policy.</LinkSafety>
